root: ^My kid wants to stay up late and watch a scary movie with me.
^Allow %Pron:1:2% to stay up and watch it
^Say %Pron:1:1% can stay up late but we will watch a comedy movie
^Say %Pron:1:1% can stay up late but we will watch an action movie

res1: ^%Pron:1:1% gets upset with me and storms off to %Pron:1:2% room but with the peace and quiet I can do some reading.

^My kid was mad I didn’t let %Pron:1:2% stay up or watch the scary movie but I think it would’ve been too much for %Pron:1:2% but I had some nice alone time to read. But I feel badly my kid is so upset with me, I hope this doesn’t last too long.
res2: ^%Pron:1:1% is happy that I let %Pron:1:2% stay up but %Pron:1:1% gets scared by the movie and is up all night having nightmares and I get no sleep.
^My kid is happy I let %Pron:1:2% watch what %Pron:1:1% wanted but %Pron:1:1% has nightmares all night and I have to stay up with %Pron:1:2% and I slept virtually 0 minutes and feel like garbage!
res3: ^%Pron:1:1% gets mad because %Pron:1:1% thinks I treat %Pron:1:2% like a baby and goes to bed early anyway. I watch the movie alone and it’s so dumb.

^I thought my kid would be happy to stay up and watch the comedy movie but %Pron:1:1% thinks I picked that because I treat %Pron:1:2% like a baby. Turns out the movie was stupid and I’m dumber for having watched it now.
res4: ^%Pron:1:1% is happy I treat %Pron:1:2% like an adult and we have a fantastic time watching the movie together.
^This was the perfect pick! The scary movie might have been too much for my kid but this action movie was still mature but not too scary for %Pron:1:2% and we had a blast watching it.
